column3: A city where the familiar and the exotic collide like the flavours on a plate of pàt tai
The pearl of the Andaman, this is Thailand’s original flavour of tailor-made fun in the sun
A schizophrenic experience: part package holiday destination; part debauchery centre
Where rock climbers and castaway vagabonds alike will find their nirvana
Thailand’s Shangri-La: a hedonistic paradise where tourists cavort in azure seas and craggy cliffs
